channel.title: LeedleScape RSPS! Join Now!
channel.description:
Leedlescape is a 317 loading 454, and is Delta Based. This is unlike any server you've ever played, mainly because of our custom pvm system and our customs themselves!
We have SO MUCH to offer, including a donatorzone, A CUSTOM POINT SYSTEM WITH REWARDS, 20+ custom bosses, 150+ custom items, 20 unique boss zones, a custom ::afk system and a unique home area. There are endless things to do on our server so come play today! SOME CUSTOMS:
[spoiler=Items We Have To Offer!] - Dragon Claws
- Supreme Claws
- Fusha Cav
- 20 Custom Bandos Chestplates
- Ghostly Bow
- Ghostly Guthans Armor
- Bankai Sword
- Farmer's Hat
- Bandos Full Helm
- Demon Head, Tail, Feet, Hands, Horns
- Zodiac Robes
- Butters Robes
- Armadyl Crossbow
- Bandos Crossbow
- Beautiful Cape
- Dlord Legs, Chest and Cape
- Santa Clothing
- Bandos WarSpear
- God Weapons and Armor
- Obsidian Armor
- Ninja Armor
- Samurai Armor
- Bowsword
- Different types of Katanas
- Sword of Fear
- Danger Cape
- Dragon Cape
- Evil Dave top and bottom
- Tri-Godsword
- Pvp Armors
- Death Cape
- Custom Phats
-And Many More!- [/spoiler]
With over 20 zones filled with bosses, we have plenty of content to go around.
BOSSES:
[spoiler=] Corporal Beast Big Swole Leeches Sea Troll Queen Phoenix The Lion God Leeches Ogre Shamen Zygomites Rockgolem Gayboy Gnome Terrorbirds -And Many more!- [/spoiler]
SCREENSHOTS:
[spoiler=] Phoenix http://gyazo.com/80a739f5fef16f13f2a4b1a11fd55779
Leeches http://gyazo.com/c370acfbc25cfb76de1e53ae85a146ab
GOD NPC http://gyazo.com/b149aad29a9ba03076a2b14ea6193051
Zygomites! http://gyazo.com/ff857473776f156f5fcfb46a877d54e6
Fully Working Cannon + Ice Queen Zone! http://gyazo.com/c12481d72dc3dfb18a8ef33652035531
Plenty of Customs! http://gyazo.com/75c55af641ce02a23c01db54cb9ac9e5
Custom AFK system with chairs! http://gyazo.com/0977ee8d190dd8a8810c82fb4f61cbf5
Our ::christmas zone with Our customized Point system! http://gyazo.com/1a3bc6a44ae56a33a96bfed26629668c [/spoiler] Although we are a relatively new server, we have two dedicated coders working around the clock to update and manage the server. Our goal is to give our players a creative and fun environment to enjoy themselves in. You can expect daily updates as well as very unique content when you play Leedlescape, and we guarentee that you'll enjoy your stay!
Join us on forums at:
http://leedlescape.freeforums.net/
Download Our client!
http://www.mediafire.com/download/3cbx3w8v1mf8esw/The+Leedle+V2.zip
***NOTE!!!!!
Once you have downloaded and extracted the zip folder, DO NOT TAKE ANYTHING OUT! If you do you won't be able to connect to the server. Simply open the extracted Leedle folder, and double click the "Leedlescape.jar" to play!
Thanks for Looking!

item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Very nice server with custom NPC’s and items.
The owners are quite active, and just released some new content and a new client.
If you like custom content come to Leedlescape.

@LeedleScape wrote:

Leedlescape is a 317 loading 454, and is Delta Based. This is unlike any server you’ve ever played, mainly because of our custom pvm system and our customs themselves!

We have SO MUCH to offer, including a donatorzone, A CUSTOM POINT SYSTEM WITH REWARDS, 20+ custom bosses, 150+ custom items, 20 unique boss zones, a custom ::afk system and a unique home area. There are endless things to do on our server so come play today!
